name: Body Bliss Intense Moisture Body Scrubs - 5 Incredible scents - 8oz
description:
BANISH DRY SKIN!

Our body scrubs are made with natural exfoliants, and deeply moisturizing oils like olive oil, coconut oil, and shea butter which help greatly improve the tone and texture of your skin by deeply moisturizing and aiding in cellular regeneration. 

Use our scrubs in place of your regular shaving cream to get the closest shave you have EVER had and kiss razor burn goodbye!

We offer 5 scents:

Creamy Vanilla Latte - (with fresh ground coffee and caffeine to smooth appearance of cellulite)

Pumpkin Spice (smells like fresh pumpkin pie)

Citrus Smoothy (citrus and ginger to energize and detoxify)

Winter (a tingly minty scrub with a subtle iridescent shimmer)

Tahitian Temptress (a yummy, toasty coconut vanilla scrub with subtle bronze shimmer)

A little goes a long way! You will notice an immediate improvement in your skin that will only get better with continued use.

WE ALSO TAKE CUSTOM SCRUB SCENT REQUESTS

name: Body Bliss Intense Moisture Body Scrubs -4oz
description: The same 5 delicious scrubs that you find in the 8oz container, but smaller.

name: Yummy Tummy Belly Balm Stick - 76g
description:
Also available as "Pure Bliss-Moisturizing massage balm" for those who arent expecting.

A deeply moisturizing formula in a convenient mess-free twist up container for helping to prevent stretch marks on growing mommy tummies, and to help restore skin's tone and elasticity after baby. Made with high concentrations of cocoa butter and shea butter and without any alcohol, mineral oils,  parabens or chemical preservatives.

Available in 2 scents:

Chocolate Orange relaxation blend made with essential oils

Vanilla Buttercream frosting 

This formula can also be used by those who aren't expecting on any part of your body.  Use it to get rid of dry, cracked heels and rough knees and elbows, or anywhere you need long lasting moisture. 

The solid formula just melts right into your skin with your body heat making it very easy to apply. 



DONT WANT TO PAY FOR SHIPPING? 

Yummy Tummy and Sleepy Bumble Bee soap are available at white rock's cutest consignment shop:

 "Not for Long"

 778-294-0401
Open Tues thru Sat 10am -5pm
1567 George Street
White Rock, BC, V4B 4A4

name: Body Bliss Natural Soaps
description:
Handmade soaps free from sulfates, alcohols and parabens. We offer several different kinds, each one smells wonderful, and has a rich creamy lather that you are sure to love. Made with no animal fats, only plant oils like olive oil and coconut oil to prevent over drying of your skin.

Available scents:

Tahitian Vanilla (soft subtle vanilla)

WinterBerry (a creamy, marshmallowy, cranberry cinnamon scent)

Citrus Ginger (candied citrus ginger notes)

Mocha Espresso (ground espresso beans with mocha and mild mint notes)

Wheatgerm honey almond (honey and almond scents)

Goatsmilk and Rosehip (fresh rose, geranium and clove notes)

Tea Tree Shampoo Bar (minty fresh solid shampoo bar good for skin conditions)

Sleepy Bumble Bee (calming, moisturizing, lavender tangerine baby soap)

Fresh Face (exfoliating jojoba bead facial soap w/beeswax and honey, subtle rose and orange blossom scent)

Lime Margarita (fresh happy lime notes, made with shea butter, beeswax and honey to be extra moisturizing)

Desert Blossom (soft sweet floral notes, neroli/orange blossom)

name: Fresh Face Anti-aging facial cream- 4oz
description:
Fresh Face Anti-aging deep hydrating facial cream is made with alpha-hydroxy acid, Vitamin E antioxidant blend, Shea butter and aloe vera to help you put your best face forward! 

Ultra moisturizing and yet not greasy so even oily skin can benefit from this luxurious facial treat. 

Penetrates deeply to help skin renew itself as old cells are sloughed off. Reduces look of fine lines and wrinkles as well as reducing pore size. Helps heal scarring and blemishes. Does not clog pores.

concentrated so a little bit goes a looonnnggg way.
